extendedInfo.description: This App provides a platform to watch Millennium Broadcasting Channel (MBC) African Programming seamlessly on your mobile devices.It also enables MBC Subscribers to keep abreast with latest News, Music, Videos, Languages and information about Africa. MBC App allows you to share yours views and comments about North Americaâs FIRST Television Station to broadcast 100% African content.Millennium Broadcasting Channel as a Company broadcast and stream Video On Demand and LIVE African Contents around the world.You can watch MBC on Houston Channel 43.2 TV, MBC Roku Channel in Ireland, UK and the rest of the world and on all mobile devices like phones and tablets.This App optimizes MBC African programming viewing on all mobile devices like Smartphones and Tablets.MBC App gives you the best of both worlds; Enjoying rich and high quality African Music, Movies, News, Language & Culture right where you are.We are constantly updating our App to improve your viewing experience.Thanks for visiting and enjoy our MBC App!
